articles.author: Paula  Cohen, Emily Mae  Czachor, Lucia I Suarez Sang
articles.title: "Bomb cyclone" winter storm brings ice and snow, snarls thousands of flights. Maps show the latest forecast. - CBS News
articles.description: More than 51 million Americans live in areas under winter storm alerts stretching from northern Minnesota to the Eastern Seaboard.
articles.content: More than 3,000 flights were canceled or delayed across the United States on Sunday after a winter storm packing ice and snow slammed the Midwest and Great Lakes regions during the busy travel period… [+5188 chars]
